title: Pixel 4a 5g mic stops working for ALL apps when I make a whatsapp call
content: Using Whatsapp which has all the necessary permissions. But after I make a whatsapp call, the mic stops working for all the apps in the phone like whatsapp, Google assistant, normal call, voice recorder, etc. When I restart the phone, the problem is fixed but only until I make another whatsapp call. Tried resetting device, updated the phone with latest software patch. But problem persists.
